name: m-shield
description: M-shield is a user-controlled, fraud-proof security layer for banking and mobile money transactions, powered by Africa’s Talking SMS, USSD, Voice, and Payment APIs. It uses a double-lock system with voice and SMS verification, plus a community fraud blacklist, to stop scams in their tracks—no AI needed, just rock-solid rules and real-time action.
author: Anwar magara
